description: React functional component named PingPanel that renders UI controls to configure and start/stop a ping session. It manages inputs for target URL/hostname, mode selection, HTTP method, interval, and timeout, and exposes start/stop handlers.

methods.name: startHandler
methods.description: Handles the start button click, invokes onStart callback with current configuration if inputs are valid.

methods.name: stopHandler
methods.description: Handles the stop button click, invokes onStop callback.

methods.name: PingPanel({ disabled = false, running = false, onStart, onStop })

ctags.name: PingPanel
ctags.pattern: /^function PingPanel({ disabled = false, running = false, onStart, onStop }) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ disabled = false, running = false, onStart, onStop })
